This [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 6, HP 36, BT 18) is forged into the shape of a roaring lion’s head. The lion’s head functions as _+1 striking [shield boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41)_ that can’t be removed from the shield.
